short_description: crown cement plc. is an asphalt & paving products company based in dhaka, bangladesh.
long_description: crown cement plc is a public limited company and one of the leading manufacturers and exporters of cement in bangladesh. on december 31, 1994 it started its journey with the commitment for providing high quality cement to the country. by dint of quality it's brand "crown cement" quickly gained acceptability both at home and abroad. with the passing of time the demand of crown cement increased day by day the initial capacity of 600 tons per day (tpd) has been raised to 11,000 tpd.
